Title: Karnataka CM writes to Modi on low water levels in State reservoirs
Content: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah on Thursday brought to the notice of Prime Minister Narendra Modi about severe shortage of water levels in State reservoirs owing to overall deficit of rains by
Author: Special Correspondent
